member.name: M:LabProject.Controllers.AppointmentController.GetAppointments
member.summary: Gets all appointments in the system.
member.returns: A list of appointments.

member.name: M:LabProject.Controllers.AppointmentController.GetAppointmentById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a specific appointment by ID.
member.returns: The requested appointment object, or 404 if not found.

member.name: M:LabProject.Controllers.AppointmentController.CreateAppointment(LabProject.Models.Appointment)
member.returns: The created appointment with a generated ID.

member.name: M:LabProject.Controllers.AppointmentController.UpdateAppointment(System.Int32,LabProject.Models.Appointment)
member.param: The ID of the appointment to update.
member.returns: The updated appointment object, or 404 if not found.

member.name: M:LabProject.Controllers.AppointmentController.DeleteAppointment(System.Int32)
member.returns: No content if deletion is successful, or 404 if not found.

member.name: T:LabProject.Controllers.LocationController
member.summary: Controller for managing locations where services are provided.

member.name: M:LabProject.Controllers.LocationController.GetLocations
member.returns: A list of all locations.

member.name: M:LabProject.Controllers.LocationController.GetLocationById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific location by its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the location.
member.returns: The location matching the ID or 404 if not found.

member.name: M:LabProject.Controllers.LocationController.CreateLocation(LabProject.Models.Location)
member.returns: The newly created location with its assigned ID.

member.name: M:LabProject.Controllers.LocationController.UpdateLocation(System.Int32,LabProject.Models.Location)
member.param: The ID of the location to update.
member.returns: The updated location or 404 if the location does not exist.

member.name: M:LabProject.Controllers.LocationController.DeleteLocation(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a location by its ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the location to delete.
member.returns: No content if deletion is successful, or 404 if location not found.
